mapper.select: SELECT sm.`logo_addr`, sm.`store_name`, sm.`sub_store_name`, sm.`area_address`, sm.`store_address`, sm.`sys_user_id` FROM marketing_gift_bag_store_batch mgbsb LEFT JOIN store_manage sm ON sm.`sys_user_id` = mgbsb.`sys_user_id` WHERE mgbsb.`del_flag` = 0 AND sm.`del_flag` = 0 AND sm.`status` = 1 AND mgbsb.`marketing_gift_bag_batch_id` = #{id}
